main.description: A colossal inland sea locked beneath ancient ice, surrounded by frost-choked forests and shattered elven ruins. The Frozen Lake is a scar of forgotten magic and environmental catastrophe, avoided by all but the desperate and the mad.
main.tagline: Where the world froze and history was buried alive.
notableFacts: Contains submerged elven ruins beneath the ice
Magical auroras are common during winter nights

geography.overview: A glacial basin encircled by frozen forests and broken highlands. Beneath the ice lie deep waters, collapsed cities, and caverns untouched for millennia.
geography.climateNotes: Perpetual winter; temperatures rarely rise above freezing.
geography.travelNotes: Travel is possible across the ice but extremely dangerous due to fractures, thin ice, and magical anomalies.

entries.description: An ancient elven civilization believed to have been annihilated when the region froze in a single catastrophic event.

vassals.notes: The Frozen Lake has no political authority; all sub-areas are unclaimed and hostile.
